snippet: A man wearing traditional South Asian clothing was punched and kicked by two men as he walked near a school in the Bronx, the police said.
lead_paragraph: A man wearing traditional South Asian clothing was punched and kicked by two men as he walked near a school in the Bronx, the police said.

headline.main: Assailants Yell ‘ISIS! ISIS!’ During Attack on Man in Bronx, Police Say

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
